test.name: Verify the homepage navigation button

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

test.name: Verify the homepage left-hand popup-menu

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.
